0.text: Innate: Rumble's basic ability casts generate  Heat, which refreshes on subsequent casts and decays by  10 Heat per second after not using any basic ability within 4 seconds or  The Equalizer within 2 seconds. Rumble's mech enters the Danger Zone when at or above  50 Heat, and becomes Overheated while at  100 Heat.
0.html: Innate: Rumble's basic ability casts generate Heat, which refreshes on subsequent casts and decays by 10 Heat per second after not using any basic ability within 4 seconds or The Equalizer within 2 seconds. Rumble's mech enters the Danger Zone when at or above 50 Heat, and becomes Overheated while at 100 Heat.
markedPassages: Heat
10 Heat
The Equalizer
50 Heat
100 Heat

1.text: Danger Zone: Rumble's mech enters the Danger Zone, empowering his basic abilities.
1.html: Danger Zone: Rumble's mech enters the Danger Zone, empowering his basic abilities.

2.text: Overheated: Rumble's mech becomes Overheated, disabling his abilities as his  Heat decays back down to 0 over 5.25 seconds. During this time, he gains  20% − 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed and empowers his basic attacks to deal 5 − 40 (based on level) (+ 25% AP) (+ 6% of the target's maximum health) bonus magic damage  on-hit. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 80 against  monsters.
2.html: Overheated: Rumble's mech becomes Overheated, disabling his abilities as his Heat decays back down to 0 over 5.25 seconds. During this time, he gains  20% − 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed and empowers his basic attacks to deal 5 − 40 (based on level) (+ 25% AP) (+ 6% of the target's maximum health) bonus magic damage on-hit. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 80 against monsters.

0.text: Active: Rumble generates  20 Heat to activate his flamethrower for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit in a frontal cone, reduced against  minions.
0.html: Active: Rumble generates 20 Heat to activate his flamethrower for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies hit in a frontal cone, reduced against minions.

1.text: Danger Zone Bonus: Flamespitter's damage is increased by 50%.
1.html: Danger Zone Bonus: Flamespitter's damage is increased by 50%.

0.text: Active: Rumble generates  20 Heat to grant himself a  shield for 1.5 seconds.

shield

1.text: Rumble also gains  bonus movement speed for 1 to 1.32 seconds.

2.text: Danger Zone Bonus: Scrap Shield's shield strength and bonus movement speed are increased in effectiveness by 50%.
2.html: Danger Zone Bonus: Scrap Shield's shield strength and bonus movement speed are increased in effectiveness by 50%.
markedPassages: Danger Zone

0.text: Active: Rumble generates  10 Heat to shoot a harpoon in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, inflicting them with  10% magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds and  slowing them for 2 seconds. These effects stack additively with multiple harpoons, refreshing their duration and stacking up to 2 times.
0.html: Active: Rumble generates 10 Heat to shoot a harpoon in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, inflicting them with  10% magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds and slowing them for 2 seconds. These effects stack additively with multiple harpoons, refreshing their duration and stacking up to 2 times.

1.text: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Danger Zone Bonus: Electro Harpoon's effects are increased by 50%. The magic resistance reduction is increased to 15%.
2.html: Danger Zone Bonus: Electro Harpoon's effects are increased by 50%. The magic resistance reduction is increased to 15%.
markedPassages: Danger Zone

3.text: If Rumble casts Electro Harpoon before his mech becomes  Overheated, he may still use another charge within 3 seconds of the initial cast.
3.html: If Rumble casts Electro Harpoon before his mech becomes Overheated, he may still use another charge within 3 seconds of the initial cast.

0.text: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets along the target path that land in a line over 0.75 seconds, creating a field of fire for 4.5 seconds after the last rocket lands.
0.html: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets along the target path that land in a line over 0.75 seconds, creating a field of fire for 4.5 seconds after the last rocket lands.

1.text: Enemies struck by the impact or within the field are marked as Burning for 1 second, which deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds,  slows by 35%, and refreshes continuously while in the area.
